[{"id":"dev-16791","entityId":"86-21623","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"dev"},{"name":"summary","value":"[Bundle] Not all Tickets for bundle component are generated and sales receipt states wrong total amount"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Walid Dechri"},{"name":"created","value":"1570521772626"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"16791"},{"name":"description","value":"
URLhttps://www.regiondo.de/resellers/account/thisiswherewehaveanissue
:
-------:
SKU ID T-ES78-101367
Account emailinfo@maxxarena.de
Supplier ID18047
Order #2070830943
Novomind Ticket ID58967
EnvironmentWindows 10, Chrome Version 68.0.3440.106


#### Steps to reproduce:
1. Check Bundle ID 95242

This bundle is composed from 2 offers (Product ID 95237 and 86876 )



2. Check booking number 2070830943




3- Check Booking confirmation email (Email ID     26748318 )


#### Actual result:
1 - Only tickets for MAXX JUMP are generated (Tickets for MAXX Climb are not generated )


2 - Booking email confirmation contains only ticket for MAXX JUMP


3 - Sales receipt states the wrong total amount and the appointment date for the tickets that aren't generated does not appear on the sales receipt.


#### Expected result:
All Tickets for bundle components should be generated, the total amount should be correct and the appointment date should be printed in sales receipt.

I see only one part of the bundle in the booking grid:

Sales receipt has missing date and wrong total:

@Walid @Sergey Dorogavcev Okay I will add more screenshots, sorry
The email is probably solved by dev-16660 then, thanks for posting.

The main issue then is though that this bug dev-16791 still persists, see booking 2073190348. It's a bundle of 3 products and only the tickets for two have been created. Sales receipt is also issued wrongly.
Offer Geburtstag Maxx VIP consists of 3 products: Climb, 3d-BlacklightGolf and Jump. Only the tickets for Blacklightgolf and Jump were created, but not for Climb
See in dashboard here (they made POS booking for the missing one):

or also in Magento, only for two out of three products tickets were created

Sales receipt also still states wrong amount:

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1572971194418,"updated":0,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":true,"replies":[]}],"tag":[{"value":"Star","cssClass":"c0"}]}, {"id":"dev-15988","entityId":"86-18319","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"dev"},{"name":"summary","value":"[Bundle] Add Gift certificate module for Bundle"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Walid Dechri"},{"name":"created","value":"1543843645434"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"15988"},{"name":"description","value":"
URLhttps://regiondo-demo-account-muenchen.regiondo.fr/packs-promo
Product ID56647
Account emaildemoaccount@regiondo.de
Supplier ID9357
EnvironmentWindows 10, Chrome Version 68.0.3440.106

Step to reproduce:

1- Go to Dashboard » Manage Offers » My Offer Bundles
2- Preview offer ID 56647

Actual result:

We can't buy gift certificate for bundle activities

Expected result:

  • FRONT END

1- Add Gift voucher module to bundle offers

1- A : 1 gift certificate code should be valid of all bundle activities.

1- B :Wen customer book more than 1 bundle tickets, propose :

  • X Single gift certificates
  • 1 Gift certificate valid for X people

2- After buying gift voucher for bundle offer, Customer should be able to redeem his voucher in the normal redeeming link and in POS

2- A : Redeeming voucher template, should propose
Font end :
Back end :

2- B- Show Custom order option if the Redeeming voucher template if bundle offer require one

2- C : if there is no availabilities , show supplier information (Company name , phone , Email address)

Unfortunately there is no appointment available, we invite you to contact %s company name :
%s phone
%s Email address

Wording
EN : Unfortunately there is no appointment available, we invite you to contact the supplier
FR : Malheureusement il n'y a pas de rendez-vous disponible, nous vous invitons de contacter le prestataire
DE : Leider ist kein Termin verfügbar, wir laden Sie ein, sich mit dem anbieter in Verbindung zu setzen:

  • POS

3- Ability to buy Gift voucher in POS

3- A- Display bundle Offer when we select Gift certificate

3- B - Same logic as in Front- end should be applied in POS

  • 1 code valid for all bundle activities.
  • Wen customer book more than 1 bundle tickets, propose :
  • X Single gift certificates
  • 1 Gift certificate valid for X people
  1. Availability of bundle voucher should be taken from Dashboard » Manage Offers » Ticket validity

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1549463861599,"updated":1549463871213,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":true,"replies":[]}],"tag":[]}, {"id":"dev-16502","entityId":"86-20534","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"dev"},{"name":"summary","value":"[Performance issue] Performance during 'Alter booking' process"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Anna Hu"},{"name":"created","value":"1562240644357"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"16502"},{"name":"description","value":"

Steps to reproduce:

  1. Login with eyetracking@regiondo.com
  2. Go to booking #3563204166
  3. Go to 'Alter booking'
  4. Alter the booking to 31st of August 2019

Actual result:

When you change a booking, there a long loading times which creates confusion. That leads to multiple clicks to change the booking as you can see on the screen.

Expected result:

Please decide which the following options is suitable for now and also for our future growing.

Option 1)
Increasing the performance so that there is no time gap (less than 1 sec.) between clicking and confirmation.

Option 2)
Insert a symbol to show while loading

See this comment regarding the symbol:
https://track.regiondo.com/issue/IDEAS-176#focus=streamItem-88-60022.0-0

Hi György Horváth in addition to https://track.regiondo.com/issue/IDEAS-171 can you prepare a suggestion?
","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1563272001694,"updated":0,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":false,"replies":[]},{"id":"88-60022","author":"g.horvath","authorFullName":"György Horváth","issueId":"dev-16502","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"

Update

V01

Based on current user flow:
https://marvelapp.com/4cad3hh/screen/59361546

V02

I do not suggest to navigate user to another page without permission, like on V01. It's against the "keeping user in control" UX rule. I kindly suggest the following flow:
https://marvelapp.com/9516gid/screen/59361793

Note:

  • The interface should not be clickable during orange modal window displayed.
  • The the progress animation is based on this: https://material.io/design/components/progress-indicators.html#circular-progress-indicators

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1565793045431,"updated":0,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":true,"replies":[]}],"tag":[]}, {"id":"dev-15803","entityId":"86-18656","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"dev"},{"name":"summary","value":"[Dashboard Calendar] Display assignee in notes "},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Alexander Bechte"},{"name":"created","value":"1547720704459"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"15803"},{"name":"description","value":"
URLhttps://www.regiondo.com/reseller/calendar/settings
Account emaildemoaccount@regiondo.de

Steps to reproduce:

  1. Login into demoaccount@regiondo.de
  2. Go to dashboard calendar
  3. Go to dashboard calendar settings

Actual result:

The option to tick "Assignee" as a card field option is displayed.
!image.png!

But no assignee is displayed after ticking this option.

Expected result:

Additional to the booking notes, the assignee should be displayed via mouse over in the dashboard calendar when option is chosen in the calendar settings.

Design notes:

  • On the top right corner, the "triangle shaped" mouse over trigger has been made slightly larger. I had to do this to achieve the even margin.
  • There is a 5 pixel margin on the top/left/right side of the booking note.
  • The assignee square has a redius set to 2.

Update

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1569837266736,"updated":1569837285688,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":true,"replies":[]}],"tag":[]}, {"id":"dev-16880","entityId":"86-21866","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"dev"},{"name":"summary","value":"[Refactoring] Refactor 'resellers/booking' helper"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Maksym Hopei"},{"name":"created","value":"1572510417114"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"16880"},{"name":"description","value":"

This helper contains methods for retrieving current reseller/partner ID. Methods were extracted from:

  • Regiondo_Reseller_Block_General
  • GreenEye_Resellers_Block_Account_Bookings_Dashboardbooking
  • GreenEye_Resellers_BookingsController
    to reduce code duplication.

Still the naming is confusing and the booking scope is not appropriate, as these methods could be also used in other scopes.

Idea:

  • Introduce a Reseller session model.
  • Use following terms:
    • supplier for the resellers - suppliers of the product
    • partner - for the resellers - partners of the suppliers
  • deprecate trait Regiondo_Reseller_Block_General in favour of using composition.
